duties.duty: Learning and practicing HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript and React.Js. Worked and used technologies and tools as Git, Figma, Postman, Babel, Webpack, VSCode, Bootstrap, etc. Worked on individual and team projects where applied in practice all I was learning during the IT bootcamp.
Answer and direct phone calls in a polite and friendly manner. Welcome visitors in a warm and friendly manner, and answer any questions visitors have.

Maintain reception area and all common areas in a clean and tidy manner at all times. Operate standard office equipment on a regular basis, including a fax machine, a copy machine, and a computer.Keep detailed and accurate records of visitor requests and of calls received.

Planned and implemented marketing strategies. I was part of a team that was organizing  charity events, press conferences, exhibitions, press visits. In the first year, I had the initiative to create  a new brand for the main social campaigns and increased the popularity of events and numbers of donations (example: The Easter Campaign Table of Joy from 32.000 to 64.000).
Writing articles for areas as advertising, technologies, IT, social campaigns, commercial interviews, fashion, interior design, psychology etc.
